item.title: Enfield Town Park Gents Toilets, 29th June
item.description:
Disgraceful mess including graffiti all over and main urinal blocked. Please fix ASAP and have made local Cllrs aware.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cecil Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped car with 10 parking tickets, 29th June
item.description:
Car been here for 6 weeks with about 10 parking tickets. Absolute joke parking here and we have to pay a permit annually. This car must have been flagged with all the parking tickets on it? Needs moving after 6 weeks and only 4 car spaces for about 50 homes this is taking up one of them! No MOT and no consideration for others. Needs moving asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Crescent Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dining room chair & a bag of paint tins dumped on the pavement of Halt Robin Road Belvedere DA17, 29th June
item.description:
A dining room chair & a bag containing tins of paint have been dumped on the pavement of Halt Robin Road Belvedere DA17, approximately 35 metres from the junction with Picardy Road Belvedere. Would arrangements be put in place to remove the items as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Halt Robin Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large apple tree breaking and leaning well into the road dangerously obstructing road., 29th June
item.description:
This is an old apple tree which is blocking a good part of the road and has long branches hanging down further into the road. It is an immediate collision hazard. The tree is heavy with fruit which is part cause but also looks like there is damage to the trunk perhaps.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broad Oaks Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging bushes, 29th June
item.description:
This problem was reported last year The access along this pavement is not accessible with a wheelchair at places the bushes are 50-60% covering the pavement there are also brambles at eye level. This needs to be cut back to the boundary of the school I contacted the school last year and was told it would not happen again. This is all along the boundary of ASPIRE ACADEMY SCHOOL in south Gipsy road. This is a public pavement and the council job to enforce rules and regulations of the highway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Gipsy Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 29th June
item.description:
Lots of rubbish on Tottenham Road - postcode is N1 4EA. We never used to have this issue with the street cleaner coming daily. No one has come for the last few weeks and now there’s lots of litter on the pavement & in the road. Please address the issue.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tottenham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
